item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

he is on pwnscape ur way is just encouraging him and others to make their server more laggey
Thats terrible u should put all admin owner and mod and normal commands into one thing for each so u can remove a whole line on each command

If (PlayerRights == 3) {
All owner commands here (minus the player rights bit)
Remember the first one goes if
All that follow are else if

then
}
if (PlayerRights >= 2) {
Now the admin commands
With the else if and if stuff

then
}

if (PlayerRights >= 1) {
Mod commands

Then
}
if (PlayerRights >= 0) {
Normal player commands

then
} if u get one hundred errors
add another
}
if u still get 100 errors
}
If you still get 100 errors

Remove all the three above if you still get errors post on help

Now explanation
This is better because
It doesnt check all commands when u type one
Only the ones for ur rights group
Also because of the else if it means that it will only keep checking for the command if u dont get it normally if it was just if it would check every command even when it found the one u typed!

This is a much better way of doing commands and i hope every server has it
Credits to the guy on runelocus for teaching me about this
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2009, 11:28:24 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Slave Scyth, post:9, topic:270998”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=357672.msg2732456#msg2732456 date=1238821338]
if(command.startsWith(“name”) && playerRights > rights){
specialAmount += Amount of spec here.;
specAttack();
}

Spoon feeds are worthless, but whatever…

You got a boolean for specattack right?
[/quote]With how awful Winterlove servers already are, you might want to change this. Since ‘and’ statements act as ‘mini ifs’, more than 1 player could return true with startsWith(); thus, it would take more time verifying the second statement when it’s unneeded. And, if you were to use equalsIgnoreCase(), without playerRights, it would also be a bit quicker.

Sorry if that was confusing. I’m just picky about when a bit of code could be more efficient. :-P[/quote]

Or my way?
Also never ever do if playerrights > then number always put >= otherwise u get a bit screwed as people of the group specified cant use it and only people above them > greater than number >= greater than or equal to number

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:8, topic:270998”]if(command.startsWith(“name”) && playerRights > rights){
specialAmount += Amount of spec here.;
specAttack();
}

Spoon feeds are worthless, but whatever…

You got a boolean for specattack right?[/quote]With how awful Winterlove servers already are, you might want to change this. Since ‘and’ statements act as ‘mini ifs’, more than 1 player could return true with startsWith(); thus, it would take more time verifying the second statement when it’s unneeded. And, if you were to use equalsIgnoreCase(), without playerRights, it would also be a bit quicker.

Sorry if that was confusing. I’m just picky about when a bit of code could be more efficient.

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Thanks ur answers were so detailed i am amazed so it was a command u were adding? well then u would have been adding it below that so u shouldnt have got that error so obviously it wasnt that code. Or u are a moron and dont reliase that u could do it in player handler and where it says spec = 100 or whatever just change it to 2147000000 yeah so please be more detailed
U could always backup and do what i say
Go into a saved char file
See that bit that talks about spec
Remember what that is called
search for it in client.java
Playerhandler and player
One of them will have the relevant thing
Hopefully u will have the common sense to work out what is the relevant code
(im not gonna spoon feed you)
For a command
First clean ur commands
(think there is a tut on runelocus on making them much cleaner)
Then make this command(ur gonna have to do capitals and stuff dont have my source here) under the
if (playerrights == 3) {
(add else here if u putting under another command)if (command.equalsignorecase(“spec”)) {
(ur special energy name(in char files)) = 99999999
sM(“you are so infinitely energised now”)
}
Enjoy
